name: hmt-escrow
description: Launch escrow contracts to the HUMAN network

scripts.create-local: npm run compile && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.deploy-local: npm run compile && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.quickstart:matic: npm run compile && node ./scripts/generatenetworkssubgraphs.js matic && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.quickstart:goerli: npm run compile && node ./scripts/generatenetworkssubgraphs.js goerli && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.quickstart:mumbai: npm run compile && node ./scripts/generatenetworkssubgraphs.js mumbai && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
scripts.remove-local: npm run compile && graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ humanprotocol/humansubgraph
